title: 211 - Energy Transfer: Value Stock Or Value Trap? (Ray Merola)
description: Why is Energy Transfer being treated so poorly by the markets? Should investors stay away or jump at the opportunity? Brian and Ray talk through the pros and cons and how to make investment decisions like this.
content:encoded: Why is Energy Transfer being treated so poorly by the markets? Should investors stay away or jump at the opportunity? Brian and Ray talk through the pros and cons and how to make investment decisions like this.
